title: In Conversation: Did Marilyn Manson hide his abuse of women in plain sight?
itunes:title: In Conversation: Did Marilyn Manson hide his abuse of women in plain sight?
description: In the past year, more than a dozen women have accused Marilyn Manson — whose real name is Brian Warner — of psychological or sexual abuse. Four women have filed civil lawsuits. Warner has denied all of the allegations. For Rolling Stone, Jason Newman and Kory Grow spent nine months reporting on these claims and talked with several of the women who have come forward. They spoke with Apple News Today host Duarte Geraldino about their investigation.
content:encoded: In the past year, more than a dozen women have accused Marilyn Manson — whose real name is Brian Warner — of psychological or sexual abuse. Four women have filed civil lawsuits.
